short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Need creative inspiration? Want to save all of your competitor's ads? Quickly download Google search ads with AdMiner.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scrape Google & Microsoft Bing text + shopping ads and related keywords with this easy to use Chrome Extension

PPC Ad Editor - AdMinerX makes it easy to download and save Google & Microsoft Bing text & shopping ads + keywords into a spreadsheet. 

**Bonus**

Now you can also save keywords related to your search query!

This helpful tool makes it easy to get creative inspiration and keep track of your competitor's ads. 

Why use AdMinerX?

✅ Spy on your competitor's text and shopping ads + site links
✅ Collect ads for various keywords for creative inspiration
✅ Get ideas on headlines and descriptions
✅ Borrow your competitor's best ads and tweak them to make it your own
✅ No more cutting and pasting ads manually
✅ Keep track of what ads are trigged by keywords
✅ Save keywords related to your search query in seconds
✅ Compatible with PPC Ad Editor Ad Preview tool
✅ Download Google & Microsoft Bing Shopping listings with image links, price, and more!

The chrome extension automatically pulls the ad content into the following columns so you can easily copy and paste into Google Ads Editor:

Search Query
Headline 1
Headline 2
Headline 3
Description 1
Description 2
Display URL
URL Path 1
URL Path 2
Sitelink Extensions
Callout Extensions
Structured Snippet Extensions
Related Keywords

Directions:

Step 1: Search for any keyword you want in Google.com or Bing.com

Step 2: Activate the chrome extension and click on "Capture Ads" or "Capture Keywords"

Step 3: Search for more keywords or click on "Download" to save the spreadsheet to your computer

Step 4: Click "Clear" to delete all previous search ads and start fresh

**PRO TIP**: Upload the spreadsheet to https://www.ppcadeditor.com to see the ads and sitelinks in a visual format (just like on Google).

You can share the ads, make comments and edit the ads with a secure link

**Note, if you see an error when trying to capture the ads, please close all browsers and restart a new session
